body.name: USB Computer Microphone with Mute Button, Plug&Play Condenser, Desktop, PC, Laptop, Mac, PS4 Mic -360 Gooseneck Design -Recording, Dictation, YouTube, Gaming, Streaming (Omnidirectional-JV601PRO)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 26 mins
features: ■ 360 Degree Position Adjustable Gooseneck Design --Pick up the sound from 360-degree with high sensitivity, in the best possible location for sound to your PC gaming, dragon voice dictation, and talk to Cortana
■ Mute Button & LED Indicator --One-click to mute/unmute your microphone, Build-in LED indicator tells you the working status at any time
■ Intelligent Noise-Canceling Tech --Premium omnidirectional condenser microphone with noise-canceling technology can pick up your clear voice and reduce background noise and echo

■ USB Plug&Play(1.8/6ft USB Cable) -- No driver required. Just need to plug & play for the microphone to start recording, well compatible with Windows(7, 8, and 10) and macOS. (NOT compatible with Xbox/Raspberry Pi/Android)
■ Solid Construction--Adopting premium metal pipe and heavy-duty ABS stand to make sure that you will be satisfied with our computer mic quality

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why Choose JV601P Desktop Microphone? Mute Switch with LED Indicator: For a clear indication of the PC microphone status.360°Flexible Gooseneck Design: The gooseneck laptop microphone allows you to adjust the perfect angle, height or swivel to show your charming voice.Best Choice for Podcast: USB microphone picks up is very crisp and very clear, fast and accurate recognition.Plug & Play for Win/Mac Computer and PS4: USB desktop microphone with plug & play compatible with Win 7/8/10/11, Mac, and PS4. Professional in recording, dictation, YouTube, Skype, gaming, streaming, podcast, etc.Desktop Base: Gaming microphone with heavy-duty housing ensures firm support for the long gooseneck.

Clear Sound with Noise Reduction Tech Intelligent noise-canceling tech not only can pick up your smooth and accurate voice but also can reduce background noise and echo Omnidirectional Polar Pattern Omnidirectional microphone pickup the sound from 360-degree with high sensitivity Built-in JOUNIVO Upgrade Chip Built-in JOUNIVO's upgrade chip make sure to pick up the high-quality sound when gaming

What can I do when the microphone cannot be used? Few ways for troubleshooting: You need to disable the computer's onboard mic by accessing your sound devices in the hardware section of the control panel. And choose the mic (JV601PRO)Check whether the "mic mute" of the online control is open or not. When the "mic mute" is open, the light will turn red.Please don't connect the microphone to an extension adapter(includes USB hub), or it will weaken the signal sent from devices. The cable length is 1.8m (6ft), long enough for daily use. Compatible with Windows 7/8/10,Windows Vista ,Windows XP Macintosh: Mac OSX(10.4.11 or higher) USB Compatibility: USB 1.1 2.0 and 3.0 Polar pattern: omnidirectional Size: 4*4*12 in Cable length: 6ft Package Included: 1 * Microphone 1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for flight sim online flying!
reviews.reviewText: Using this guy for my radio communications on the VATSIM air traffic control network and flight sim. Looks great with my setup and the controllers said the audio is clear, concise and high quality. Love the mute and gain feature. Highly recommend this to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for remote work
reviews.reviewText: Much simpler than a headset and it works fine. Low cost and good features and performance. I like that you can mute on the computer or the mike stand. I recommend these to my coworkers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Attractive PC microphone, Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Like the gooseneck to flex mic to position on top of my PC monitor shelf. Liked the push button mute with light (and yes, I did test as other reviews say the mute did not mute). Works well for my need for hands free speaker talking (as a mic should). Had this for 1.5 months and still works fine.One star down for low volume. The volume control doesn't really increase volume at all.I also had to fiddle around as it did not connect consistently when using an external AC powered USB 3.0 hub. It needs to directly connect to PC's USB port or a USB 2.0 hub.Note: You can detach the mic from the stand holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars durable and perfect for Zoom'ing
reviews.reviewText: During Covid, I hosted a weekly Zoom meeting for members of my dance club to stay in touch. Each week, my wife and I would start up the Zoom call on my computer and then huddle in front of the computer but the audio was always hard as the computer required the speaker to be right in front of the laptop. We ordered this mic and it has been great. The sound quality is very good and it has a wide angle of response so my wife and I could be comfortably apart, and even behind the microphone refilling our glass and the microphone still picked up our vocal input. We now start a Zoom call each week so people can watch our dance remotely and I place this microphone in front of the speakers so the viewer can hear the music and the caller/cuer (it's a Square Dance and Round Dance club). The sound quality is great but I'm most impressed with the durability of this microphone. For the last 2+ years, I've been jamming this mic into my backpack and then setting up up for the dancing and then bringing back home and it is rock-solid. I fully expected that by now I'd have a short in the wires but this is a quality unit. The volume adjustment and mute button are also very handy. I can't recommend this device highly enough. Great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mic for mac
reviews.reviewText: This mic is a low cost excellent tool to dictate your words to text on a Mac computer. It works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely awful for voice dictation on PC for work purposes.
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely awful for voice dictation on PC for work purposes. For my work, I use Dragon Nuance NaturallySpeaking version 15 and with this microphone was using the standard USB port (rated to USB 3.0)-- but after using the software and going through multiple attempts at dictation training (between four and six unsuccessful attempts from what I can recall) this microphone was an absolute dud. It may have been a faulty unit, but it was absolutely atrocious added this lack of accuracy and I would never consider purchasing this under any circumstances if voice dictation and accuracy of work is something important to you. Avoid-- despite the tempting price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No better than my webcam built in microphone, great otherwise.
reviews.reviewText: I got this hoping that a purpose built microphone would have better quality than the tiny one built into my webcam. I didn't want to buy a gigantic $200 microphone, and so it seemed the only option was a cheap one like this, or one of those. Well I guess I shouldn't have bothered because everyone I talk to reports that there is no difference in audio quality between this and my webcam mic. I can't give it too low of a rating for that though since its price is so low, you can't expect too much of it. Other than the sound quality, it's great. I the arm is very flexible and it is properly weighted so it stays in place. I love the volume knob right on it for fast adjusting without fiddling with finding a setting. Setting it up was easy, and I never had feedback issues. If you're looking for a basic little microphone, it does a great job.*Update* I've had it several months now, and every now and then it stops working. It's only happened three times ever, and when it does, a computer restart usually fixes it. I think it's a software problem and not a hardware one though since some programs still see it, while others like zoom or my phone will not. Just FYI.
Todo perfecto. Si acaso lo único que podría ser mejorable es el diseño.

Bought this for zoom meetings so we wouldn't have to sit so close to camera. Works well but still have to speak directly into mic according to feedback. Could be settings related but is not obvious. Achieves purpose tho.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great microphone, but not for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a new microphone that I could use for my video calls. And although this microphone has great features, it didn't pick up voice clear from a short distance. I found that I had to have it in front of my face for meetings, which I didn't really want to do, since I want my desk clear - this was a huge factor for me so I ended up returning it and getting something more expensive.Still a great product, and if you don't mind having this in front of your face while talking, I would say it's perfect.
Produto muito bom, pelo custo benefício.
I’m not impressed with the sound quality. Immediately I noticed it didn’t pick up as well as my laptop mic.This was when I first got it. Tried it out the other day and it was even worse.
